00024         void Level::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00025         {
00026             /* Play some music. */
00027             if(element->Attribute("music")) {
00028                 string music = element->Attribute("music");
00029             }
00030 
00031             /* Load the world. */
00032             if(element->Attribute("world")) {
00033                 if(world)
00034                     delete world;
00035 
00036                 string worldFileName = element->Attribute("world");
00037                 world = new Sketch(worldFileName);
00038                 collisionDetector = new CollisionDetector(world);
00039                 boundingBox = BoundingBox(Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f),
00040                         world->getSize());
00041             } else {
00042                 LogManager::getInstance()->warning(
00043                         "No world attribute specified in the level xml.");
00044                 world = 0;
00045             }
00046 
00047             /* Walk through the file, adding entities. */
00048             TiXmlElement *entityElement = element->FirstChildElement("entity");
00049             while(entityElement) {
00050                 Entity *entity = new Entity(entityElement, this);
00051                 addEntity(entity);
00052                 entityElement = entityElement->NextSiblingElement("entity");
00053             }
00054 
00055             /* Add the camera. */
00056             TiXmlElement *cameraElement = element->FirstChildElement("camera");
00057             if(cameraElement) {
00058                 if(!cameraElement->Attribute("type"))
00059                     LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00060                             "Camera element always needs a type attribute.");
00061 
00062                 if(camera)
00063                     delete camera;
00064 
00065                 string type = cameraElement->Attribute("type");
00066                                 camera = new Camera(cameraElement, this);
00067             } else {
00068                 camera = 0;
00069             }
00070         }
00071 
00072         Level::Level()
00073         {
00074             world = 0;
00075             collisionDetector = 0;
00076             camera = 0;
00077         }

00079         Level::Level(TiXmlElement *element)
00080         {
00081             world = 0;
00082             collisionDetector = 0;
00083             camera = 0;
00084             load(element);
00085         }

00087         Level::Level(const string &fileName)
00088         {
00089             world = 0;
00090             collisionDetector = 0;
00091             camera = 0;
00092             load(fileName);
00093         }
00094 
00095         Level::~Level()
00096         {
00097             if(world)
00098                 delete world;
00099             if(collisionDetector)
00100                 delete collisionDetector;
00101             for(vector<Entity*>::iterator iterator = entities.begin();
00102                     iterator != entities.end(); iterator++)
00103                 delete (*iterator);
00104             if(camera)
00105                 delete camera;
00106         }

00109         {
00110             return world;
00111         }

00113         CollisionDetector *Level::getCollisionDetector() const
00114         {
00115             return collisionDetector;
00116         }

00118         int Level::getNumberOfEntities() const
00119         {
00120             return (int) entities.size();
00121         }
00122 
00123         Entity *Level::getEntity(int index) const
00124         {
00125             return entities[index];
00126         }
00127 
00128         void Level::addEntity(Entity *entity)
00129         {
00130             /* Guard from id duplicates. */
00131             if(getEntityById(entity->getId()))
00132                 LogManager::getInstance()->warning("Duplicate entity id: %s",
00133                         entity->getId().c_str());
00134 
00135             entities.push_back(entity);
00136             entitiesById[entity->getId()] = entity;
00137             EntityEventManager::getInstance()->spawn(entity);
00138                         EntityEventManager::getInstance()->myfun(entity);
00139         }
00140 
00141         Entity *Level::getEntityById(const string &id)
00142         {
00143             map<string, Entity*>::iterator result = entitiesById.find(id);
00144             if(result != entitiesById.end())
00145                 return result->second;
00146             else
00147                 return 0;
00148         }
00149 
00150         void Level::update(float ms)
00151         {
00152             if(camera)
00153                 camera->update(ms);
00154 
00155             for(vector<Entity*>::iterator iterator = entities.begin();
00156                     iterator != entities.end(); iterator++) {
00157                 Entity *entity = *iterator;
00158 
00159                 entity->update(ms);
00160 
00161                 /* When below the level, they become garbage. */
00162                 if(entity->getPosition().getY() - entity->getRadius().getY() >
00163                         world->getSize().getY())
00164                     entity->setGarbage();
00165             }
00166 
00167             /* Flush all events, so there are no event references remaining
00168              * on the queue, making this a good time for clearing the
00169              * garbage. */
00170             EntityEventManager::getInstance()->flush();
00171 
00172             /* Remove garbage. */
00173             vector<Entity*> originalEntities = entities;
00174             entities.clear();
00175             for(vector<Entity*>::iterator iterator = originalEntities.begin();
00176                     iterator != originalEntities.end(); iterator++) {
00177                 if(!(*iterator)->isGarbage()) {
00178                     entities.push_back(*iterator);
00179                 } else {
00180                     entitiesById.erase((*iterator)->getId());
00181                     delete (*iterator);
00182                 }
00183             }
00184         }
00185 
00186         void Level::render()
00187         {
00188             BoundingBox *cameraBoundingBox;
00189             if(camera) {
00190                 camera->transform();
00191                 cameraBoundingBox = camera->getBoundingBox();
00192             }
00193 
00194             if(world)
00195                 world->render(cameraBoundingBox);
00196 
00197             Entity *entity;
00198             for(vector<Entity*>::iterator iterator = entities.begin();
00199                     iterator != entities.end(); iterator++) {
00200                 entity = *iterator;
00201                 if(camera) {
00202                     /* Try not too render all entities by using a bounding box
00203                      * test. */
00204                     if(entity->getBoundingBox()->intersectsWith(
00205                             cameraBoundingBox))
00206                         entity->render();
00207                 /* No camera, so we could be anywhere. Render anyway. */
00208                 } else {
00209                     entity->render();
00210                 }
00211             }
00212         }
00213     }
00214 }
